rows: Select case category to apply the rule.
Select case status to apply the rule.
Select the template to send as a notification according to the rule.
Whether to send the notification immediately or after a delay. To configure the sending delay of the rule, specify the "Send after a delay" usage rule and fill out theSending delay, minutescolumn.

Specify sending delay of the notification. For example, the feedback requests can be sent after the specified time after resolving a case. This will allow the client to use the provided solution and evaluate its effectiveness.
Select the checkbox to include the text of the original case email in the notification.
html:
Parameter

Parameter value

Case category

Select case category to apply the rule.

Case status

Select case status to apply the rule.

Email message template

Select the template to send as a notification according to the rule.

Usage rule

Whether to send the notification immediately or after a delay. To configure the sending delay of the rule, specify the "Send after a delay" usage rule and fill out the Sending delay, minutes column.

Sending delay, minutes

Specify sending delay of the notification. For example, the feedback requests can be sent after the specified time after resolving a case. This will allow the client to use the provided solution and evaluate its effectiveness.

Quote original email

Select the checkbox to include the text of the original case email in the notification.
